name: Surreal House
description:
Hired to save a man. Sent to a mysterious address. The detective enters a house.



Surreal House is a point-and-click puzzle game inspired by escape rooms.

- a casual experience, a game where solving puzzles is the main focus
- no time pressure, solve at your own pace
- escape room inspired gameplay with different types of puzzles
- a tense and atmospheric original soundtrack​
- 2D art inspired by noir comic books
